Functional Programming

const users = [
	{ id: 1, name: "Pesho", email: "pesho@mail.bg" },
	{ id: 2, name: "Gosho", email: "gosho@abv.bg" },
	{ id: 3, name: "Tosho", email: "tosho@gmail.com" },
];

users.reduce((hash, user) =>
	(hash[user.id] = user.name) && hash
, {});
// {1: Pesho, 2: Gosho, 3: Tosho}
